column1: Smoque BBQ////The smell of BBQ wafting through the air gives me more than enough reason to grab a place at the end of the order line that is far outside the door. 15 minutes go by and the line is creeping s-l-o-w-l-y along
column2: but I decide to stick it out. I see each customer get to the counter and take
column3: what seems to be an eternity to place their order. It is a full 25 minutes before I finally make it to the register to place my order. And
